9 (Math and eText MCQ image in Choice )

nodes.text: • Identify the types of cash flows needed in the capital budgeting process
• Forecast incremental earnings in a pro forma earnings statement for a project
• Convert forecasted earnings to free cash flows and compute a project’s NPV
• Recognize common pitfalls that arise in identifying a project’s incremental free cash flows
• Assess the sensitivity of a project’s NPV to changes in your assumptions
• Identify the most common options available to managers in projects and understand why these options can be valuable

stage.text: 9 Fundamentals of Capital Budgeting Learning Objectives • Identify the types of cash flows needed in the capital budgeting process • Forecast incremental earnings in a pro forma earnings statement for a project • Convert forecasted earnings to free cash flows and compute a project’s NPV • Recognize common pitfalls that arise in identifying a project’s incremental free cash flows • Assess the sensitivity of a project’s NPV to changes in your assumptions • Identify the most common options available to managers in projects and understand why these options can be valuable
